document.topic_text: Informal dwellings removed The informal dwellings on open land in Davidson Road were removed. Photo: Emsie Martin GEORGE NEWS - The recent fire in the open veld in Davidson Road opposite the George Hospital exposed a number of informal dwellings but they were removed very soon after, following complaints by residents of the nearby Heatherlands neighbourhood. According to George Municipality Acting Communications Manager Chantel Edwards-Klose, the municipality demolished the structures. "The land is the property of the provincial government. Our land management team did, however, remove all the dwellings on Tuesday 16 August." She said the people were not relocated. "Everyone who genuinely needs accommodation is referred to the Housing Department's offices and they are assisted in accordance with the applicable policies," said Edwards-Klose.
